contentrichtext.text: '''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding the proposed deletion of the page entitled [[Russian military doctrine]].''' '''This page is kept as an historic record.''' '''The result of the debate was to delete the article.''' ---- POV rant. [[User:RickK|Rick]]'''[[User talk:RickK|K''']] 23:28, 15 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete. POV essay by anon, which is quite enough in itself IMO, but this one is largely speculation. It contains no useful material and some outright inaccuracies. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] 23:59, 15 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete. No references. It is not even about military doctrine as the term is used in military articles. [[User:Kd4ttc|Kd4ttc]] 02:57, 16 May 2004 (UTC) * Delete. Doesn't correspond to its name. [[User:Mikkalai|Mikkalai]] 03:26, 16 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete, for any one of several different reasons. [[User:MK|MK]] 05:50, 16 May 2004 (UTC) * Delete this total rant which has nothing to do with military doctrine or history in Russia or China or elsewhere. [[User:AlainV|AlainV]] 21:19, 2004 May 16 (UTC) * Original research ''at best''. Delete. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 22:08, May 16, 2004 (UTC) * Speculation. Not terribly informed speculation, either. [[User:Isomorphic|Isomorphic]] 02:13, 17 May 2004 (UTC) ---- This page is now preserved as an archive of the debate and is no longer 'live'. Subsequent comments on the issue or the deletion should be placed on other relevant 'live' pages. '''Please do not edit this page.''' ----
